meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Maggie Davis Manuel Bermúdez Julia Collins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6848.

td.p: Maggie Davis, a violin and viola teacher from Indianapolis, Indiana
Manuel Bermúdez, a legal assistant originally from Modesto, California
Julia Collins, a supply chain professional from Kenilworth, Illinois (whose 17-day cash winnings total $372,700)

tr.td: PIN THE TALE ON THE DONKEY
DOUBLE DOUBLE VOWELS
OOO, SORRY
(Alex: I did that so well.)
ASIAN HISTORY
GROUPIES
WE'RE WITH "THE" BAND

tr.td: Julia
Manuel
Maggie
GOVERNMENT & POLITICS
BIBLICAL NEXT OF KIN
MLB TEAMS EN FRANÇAIS
(Alex: We'll give you the French.)
STATES THAT END IN "IA"
NEWER WORDS & PHRASES
(Jimmy: From particle accelerators to scanning the surface of Mars, it's at the forefront of scientific discovery.)
